TemporalShift.Narrative: unleashes a time-bending blow, freezing the opponent momentarily.

CelestialBarrage.Narrative: summons a hail of celestial projectiles.

EtherealChains.Narrative: binds the target with chains forged from aether, crippling their movement.

VoidPulse.Narrative: emits a pulse of void energy, silencing magic use.

DarkMend.Narrative: envelops in dark energy, restoring health.

InfernoBlast.Narrative: casts a devastating explosion of fire.

FrostveilStrike.Narrative: strikes with a blade encased in ice, chilling their foe to the bone.

StormFury.Narrative: calls down a relentless storm to smite foes with lightning.

SpectralGrasp.Narrative: reaches out with ghostly hands, instilling fear.
